forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly clear after midnight. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly clear after midnight. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 63F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning with numerous thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with thunderstorms developing in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning, then partly cloudy and windy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning, then partly cloudy and windy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 6C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 44F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
